data_table.description: The dataset provides information about gender and affection status of subjects' and affection status of participating family members.

variable.name: affecteds_fam
variable.description: Number of affected individuals in pedigree
variable.comment: Number of total affected individuals (either Tourette Syndrome or Chronic Tic Disorder) in extended family

variable.name: TS_affecteds_fam
variable.description: Number of Tourette Syndrome affected individuals in pedigree
variable.comment: Number of total affected individuals with Tourette Syndrome in extended family

variable.name: CT_affecteds_fam
variable.description: Number of chronic tic disorder affected individuals in pedigree
variable.comment: Number of total affected individuals with Chronic Tic Disorder in extended family
